name: Dragon Dancer: The Quest For Treasure
name_original: Dragon Dancer: The Quest For Treasure
description:
This is a small puzzle adventure game made for the NESmaker Jam.

https://itch.io/jam/nesmaker-hypejam

Arrows to move

Z to interact

X to Jump

C to open menu

Can you enter the manor and solve the mystery within? Or will you be lost to the looping maze?

There are two unlockable characters, good luck!
